name: Up is the only way
description:
Up is the only way,

is a game made for Dev League Round 5. The theme for the round was The only way is up

🖱️ Controls

  • Left mouse button
  • Space bar

👑 Dev League

Dev League is league based competition played out over the course of 10 rounds.

Learn more 

✌️ Rate and Reviews

If you like the jam submission.

Do rate and leave a comment. It helps us stay motivated and prepare for next round.

❤️ Thanks for playing
